title: Orange loaf cake

ingMand.name: baking powder (or baking soda if using sourdough)

insSteps: Preheat oven to 180 °C and grease a loaf pan.
In a bowl, cream butter and sugar for 5 minutes, until it's nice and fluffy. Add in the eggs one at a time, mixing until each is fully combined. Add the sourdough starter and orange zest.
Add the dry ingredients: flour, baking powder (or Natron), and salt. Mix until fully combined.
Add the orange juice, lemon juice and sour cream, mix until fully combined.
Add slices of apple to the mixture.
Bake for 60–65 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean. Let it cool on a wire rack for at least 30 minutes.

notes: Half an orange will give approximately 5 tpbs of juice.
Tip: I put the butter in the oven at 30 °C for 10 minutes to get it soft enough to work with.
